solr_server_url.label: Solr Server ROOT URL
solr_server_url.comment: Must be end with forward slash (/). Example: http://localhost:8080/solr/

relevancy.label: Relevancy
relevancy.comment: Yes means AND, No means OR. Example: we have 2 products "Canon PowerShot" and "Canon Digital Rebel", if this set to Yes and the search keyword = "Canon powershot" the search result will return only 1 product Canon PowerShot, if this set to No the search result will return both products.

allow_part_of_word.label: Allow match part of word
allow_part_of_word.comment: Default is Yes, But if you would like the search result match only whole word please set this to No. Example: If you have a product Nokia Lumina, assume that you set this to Yes, and you search on the frontend with the keyword "limi" the product will be found on search result and vice versa.

solr_server_url_auth.label: Solr Server Authentication(yes/no)
solr_server_url_auth.comment: If your solr server is protected by username/password, please set this to yes

solr_server_url_auth_username.label: Solr Server Authentication Username
solr_server_url_auth_username.comment: Leave this blank if your Solr server not protected

solr_server_url_auth_password.label: Solr Server Authentication Password
solr_server_url_auth_password.comment: Leave this blank if your Solr server not protected

solr_index.label: Solr index
solr_index.comment: Select which Solr index the store will search in. (If you dont see any core, please goto to Default Config > Solr Bridge > Indices Settings to map your stores into Solr cores)

solr_quick_search_display_thumnail.label: Display thumnail for the instant search

solr_index_auto_when_product_save.label: Update index immediately after product save.

items_per_page.label: Items per page
items_per_page.comment: How many products display on search result page

use_ajax_result_page.label: Use ajax result page
use_ajax_result_page.comment: Use ajax behaviour for result page

use_price_slider.label: Use price slider on search result page
use_price_slider.comment: Set this to yes if you would like do use price slider instead of price ranges on search result page.

items_per_commit.label: Items per commit(For indexing)
items_per_commit.comment: Number of products per Solr commit

check_instock.label: Check instock
check_instock.comment: Allow only in stock products in search

included_subproduct.label: Included sub products
included_subproduct.comment: Include sub products data for search

display_keyword_suggestion.label: Display keyword suggestion
display_keyword_suggestion.comment: Display keyword suggestion on Autocomplete search

currency_position.label: Currency symboy position
currency_position.comment: Select Yes to display symboy before, select No to display symboy after

allow_multiple_filter.label: Allow multiple filter
allow_multiple_filter.comment: Allow multiple filter on search result page

excluded_categories.label: Excluded categories from search
excluded_categories.comment: Excluded categories from search (categories id separated by comma). Warning: When you change this setting please empty and reindex the whole

excluded_categories_recusive.label: Recusive Excluded categories
excluded_categories_recusive.comment: If this set to Yes, then all chidren categories of category id above will be ignored as well. Warning: When you change this setting please empty and reindex the whole.

display_brand_suggestion.label: Display Brand/Manufacturer suggestion
display_brand_suggestion.comment: Display Brand/Manufacturer on Autocomplete search. If this set to Yes, please dont forget to set the attribute code for Brand/Manufacturer below

search_weight_attribute_code.label: Product search weight
search_weight_attribute_code.comment: Product search weight attribute code (Must be an integer attribute). Example: we have 3 products Canon 5d, Canon 6d, and Canon 7d, if you want the product Canon 7d to be displayed before Canon 5d, and Canon 6d, just create a product attribute and and set the attribute value heigher than Canon 5d and Canon 6d. Note: The attribute should be a textfield attribute and Please put the attribute code which you have just created in this setting field.

autocomplete_category_redirect.label: Suggest category redirect
autocomplete_category_redirect.comment: This setting allows to controll where suggest category redirect to. Please set this to Yes to redirect to cateory page, set this to No to redirect to search result page.

autocomplete_product_limit.label: Autocomplete products limit
autocomplete_product_limit.comment: The numer of products will be displayed on autocomplete.

autocomplete_brand_limit.label: Autocomplete brands limit
autocomplete_brand_limit.comment: The numer of brands will be displayed on autocomplete.

autocomplete_category_limit.label: Autocomplete categories limit
autocomplete_category_limit.comment: The numer of categories will be displayed on autocomplete.

autocomplete_thumb_size.label: Autocomplete thumb size
autocomplete_thumb_size.comment: Default is 32x32, How large image thumnails will be displayed on autocomplete.

autocomplete_special_offers.label: Autocomplete special offers
autocomplete_special_offers.comment: Please put product ids separated by comma here, do display special offer on autocomplete search.

use_tags_for_search.label: Include product tags for search
use_tags_for_search.comment: Please set this to Yes, if you would like to include product tags in search. Note: if this set to Yes, please empty solr index and reindex again.

write_log.label: Allow write log message
write_log.comment: Write solr bridge log message to file in var/solrbridge

thread_enable.label: Allow php thread (background running)
thread_enable.comment: Allow thread for Solr Indexing, this will help to improve indexing performanace because the process will running as php thread in the background. This will be helpfull if the store has a lot products which will take hours for Solr indexing. The admin will click the button Update index one time and the indexing process will running in the background. Please make sure PHP CLI enabled in your server.

remove_store_from_url.label: Remove store from Product Url
remove_store_from_url.comment: Set this to Yes to remove store from Product Url for autocomplete search.

replace_catalog_layer_nav.label: Replace Catalog Layer Navigation
replace_catalog_layer_nav.comment: Set this to Yes to replace Magento Catalog Layer Nagivation with SolrBridge Layer Navigation.

advanced_autocomplete.label: Use Advanced Autocomplete
advanced_autocomplete.comment: If set this to Yes, please make sure that the folder app/etc is writable or just create a new file app/etc/solrbridge.conf and set its permission to 777, after that go to SolrBridge > General settings and click Save configuration so the system will generate a static configuration file for Solr.

multiplestore.label: Multiple store mode
multiplestore.comment: Select No if you setup your multiple store by different category root, and the same website. Select Yes if you setup your multiple store by different category root and different website.

allow_ignore_term.label: Ignore search terms from autocomplete
allow_ignore_term.comment: If set this to Yes, The following search terms will be ignore from Autocomplete search

ignoresearchterms.label: Search terms to ignore.
ignoresearchterms.comment: Put search term separated by comma. Note, this field will be updated automatically according to Catalog > Search terms
